title: calculate method with 2D array - describe behavior

content.question: Which of the following best describes the value returned by the calculate method?

choices.label: A count of the positive elements in column x of values
A count of the positive elements in row x of values
The sum of the positive elements in column x of values
The sum of the positive elements in row x of values

content.answer: The sum of the positive elements in row x of values

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
